attr_Coffee_Type: The species and variety of coffee bean.
attr_Processing_Method: The method used to process the coffee cherries and extract the green beans.
attr_Origin_Country: Country where the product was originally grown or produced.
attr_Coffee_Grade: The grade assigned to the coffee beans based on size, quality, and defects.
attr_Screen_Size: The screen size used to sort the coffee beans by size.
attr_Coffee_Form: The physical form of the coffee.
attr_Coffee_Color: The color of the coffee beans.
attr_Certifications: Certifications associated with the coffee beans.
attr_Flavor: Specific flavorings or flavor profiles added to the finished coffee product.
attr_Product_Form: Physical state or type of the finished coffee product.
attr_Packaging_Type: Type of packaging used for the finished coffee product.
attr_Net_Weight: Net weight of the finished coffee product in grams or kilograms.
attr_Brand: Brand name of the finished coffee product.
attr_Destination_Country: Country to which the product is being shipped.
attr_Product_Type: General category of the shipped goods.
